stimulusHtml: What is printed as a result of the method call  stars(5)?

features.html:
Consider the following recursive method.
 

public static void stars(int num)
{
   if (num == 1)
   {
      return;
   }

   stars(num - 1);

   for (int i = 0; i < num; i++)
   {
      System.out.print("*");
   }
   System.out.println();
}
